content: We updated our servers over the weekend. All account login information has been reset. To access your account, enter your full name followed by the year you were born. Please remember to change your password after logging in.

Just a heads up that I’ll be absent for the next few days. I’ve been assigned to travel to the Microbiology Institute to pick up some lab samples. If you need to access any of my files in the meantime, feel free to log into my computer. I haven’t changed the password yet.

It seems I misplaced one of the virus samples you prepared for Experiment LT-9318. Would you mind aliquoting an extra 50 uL of the AR-D98 sample and dropping it off at my workstation by the end of today?
By the way - Jenna’s birthday is next Tuesday! We’re all gonna pitch in $5 to get her a gift. Let me know if you’re able to contribute.
It seems many of you have been having trouble with the new software. Here are some helpful tips for using the terminal:
help - view list of available commands
Let me know if you require additional assistance.
